text: Dudley Manlove (June 11, 1914 - April 17, 1996) was an American radio announcer, movie actor, and television actor. He had a few parts in movies that included the space alien, Eros, in Ed Wood's 1959 science fiction classic, Plan 9 from Outer Space. On television, he appeared in many series including Dragnet and Alfred Hitchcock Presents. Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:1914 births Category:1996 deaths
title: Dudley Manlove
